title: ContactSubmission
description: Schema for storing employee transportation service contact form submissions.

firstName.description: First name of the contact person.

lastName.description: Last name of the contact person.

email.description: Email address of the contact person.

phone.description: Phone number of the contact person.

employeeCount.description: Number of employees in the company.

serviceTypes.description: List of transportation service types requested.

message.description: Additional message from the contact person.

status.description: Current status of the contact submission.

createdAt.description: Date when the submission was created.

updatedAt.description: Date when the submission was last updated.
